attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to stop the unnecessary and outdated practice of t.v licencing, the bbc should advertise on their own and not charge us for the right not to. we have licences to drive, for guns, for hosepipes all of which have factors in death why do we need one for pictures on a box, £135 for a year could be better spent on rising energy costs not lining the bbc's pockets

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
